import React, { Component } from 'react' import _ from 'lodash' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import history from '@/utils/history' import Stepper from '@/components/stepper' import ConnectComponent from '@/connect' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import { Radio } from '@/components/radio' import Alert from '@/components/alert' import Loader from '@/components/loader' import { LoaderFlash } from '@/components/loader' import { ColoredButtons, TransparentButtons } from '@/components/button/index' import { GetCampaign } from '@/actions/CreateCampaign/emailCampaign' import { SendCampaign, GetTimeString } from '@/actions/utils' class StepFive extends Component { state = { campaignId: '', steps: ['Channel', 'Message', 'Scheduling', 'Segmentation', 'Overview & Send'], sent: false, } async componentWillMount() { const { params: { campaignId }, } = this.props.match this.setState({ campaignId, }) await GetCampaign(campaignId) } sendCampaign = async () => { const { campaignId } = this.state await SendCampaign({ campaignID: parseInt(campaignId, 10) }) this.setState({ sent: true, }) setTimeout(function() { history.push('/email') }, 4000) } render() { const { steps, campaignId, sent } = this.state const { CreateCampaign } = this.props const data = CreateCampaign.data if (CreateCampaign.loading) { return } return ( {CreateCampaign.error && Error: {CreateCampaign.error}}
Campaign Details
Edit
Campaign Name
: {_.get(data, 'name')}
Campaign title
: {_.get(data, 'title')}
Send TO
: {_.get(data, 'senderName')}
From
: {_.get(data, 'senderEmailId')}
Reply TO
: {_.get(data, 'replyToEmailId')}
Scheduling
Edit
Schedule Time
: {GetTimeString(_.get(data, 'scheduledTime'))}
Segmentation
Edit
Users
: {_.get(data, 'userFilePath')}
Send Test Notification
Send Test Campaign
Send Save as Draft {sent && } ) } } export default ConnectComponent(StepFive)
